description:
Overview* Cable Matters USB 3.0 to HDMI/DVI Adapter turns an available USB 3.0 port into an HDMI/DVI 
output.* Leveraging the high-bandwidth (5 Gbps, 10x faster than USB 2.0) SuperSpeed 
USB 3.0 interface, the adapter functions as an external graphics card to deliver 
smooth, high-definition content to your HDTV or monitors at up to 2048x1152 / 
1920x1200.* It also provides a convenient external video solution that makes it easy to add multi-monitor capability to a USB 3.0 enabled desktop or laptop computer.Instructions1 Plug & Play after one time driver installation2 Please consult user manual for configuring video display and audio outputSpecifications* Uses latest DisplayLink DL-3500 chipset* 
I/O: USB 3.0 Male, HDMI Female, DVI Female* Supported Resolutions: up to 2048x1152 / 1920x1200* Supports USB 3.0 SuperSpeed with 5 Gbps Bandwidth (Backward Compatible with USB 2.0)* Supports Hot Swapping* Multiple adapters can support up to 6 displays* Audio Output: 2-Channel LPCM* Hardware requirement: dual core or 2 Ghz or better CPU for smooth videoCompatibilityMac OS X (Audio Support Requires v10.8.5 or higher)* 10.9 Mavericks (Extension mode only, mirroring not supported due to OS 
limitation)* 10.8 Mountain Lion* 10.7 Lion* 10.6 Snow Leopard* 10.5 Leopard* 10.4 TigerWindows:* Windows 8.1 64/32 bits* Windows 8 64/32 bits* Windows 7 64/32 bits* Windows Vista 64/32 bits* Windows XP 32 bitsPackage Contents* Cable Matters USB 3.0 to HDMI Adapter* HDMI to DVI Adapter in white (Male to Female)* CD with Software Drivers* User Manual
title: Cable Matters SuperSpeed USB 3.0/2.0 to HDMI/DVI Adapter for Windows and Mac up to 2048x1152/1920x1200 in White
